REN MESSAGE FOR NANA I GOT BACK IN JAPAN TODAY.
PLEASE GIVE ME A CALL.
- Did you read it? - Yeah.
Without delay, the eight-day seven-night long recording
at the training camp finally came to an end.
But even after returning to Tokyo,
I cannot go home while the place is still infested with them mosquitoes.
What are you reading, Shin?
You are into literature, I see.
An erotic novel.
Mika bought it for me at a book stand.
Is it any good, Shin?
Not at all.
Huh?
- No use trying to tease him, Mika.
Oh, Mika.
- I think Shin knows more about that - You can only touch him
- than you do.
- from the neck up.
But this is good study material.
What study is that?!
THE HOUSEWIFE NEXT DOOR AI YAZAWA
THE HOUSEWIFE NEXT DOOR AI YAZAWA The Housewife Next Door?
THE HOUSEWIFE NEXT DOOR AI YAZAWA
Starting today,
we are all being thrown into the so-called agency's dormitory.
They just call it a dormitory.
It is really a regular apartment building.
It is for our agency's talents only, though.
Everyone gets his own room, there is no curfew,
and no nosy dorm supervisor.
But security and facilities are above standards,
so it is safe and comfortable!
I do not care what it is, as long as I can relax and get some sleep.
You are better off not opening the window.
That is a love hotel next door.
They are not likely to open their window too often either.
What is comfortable about this?!
I do not get any sunlight here!
You have your own toilet and shower.
Where is the bathtub?
You are such a complainer!
Who do you think you are?
If you want to live the high life, then work your way up there.
I will make certain that you have a full schedule starting tomorrow.
Wait, Ginpei!
Is there a phone?
There is one on the first floor at the front desk!
The front desk?
At least buy a cell phone!
Work will be
- so inconvenient without one. -
That is not a front desk!
And the security guard's asleep!
What is the point of having one?
He is bored, which is proof of how safe it is.
I will pick you up tomorrow morning at seven.
Do not go wandering off outside!
There is something wrong.
Something is definitely wrong about this production company.
Even the president was a weirdo.
Well, do your best.
No, I cannot judge people on their appearances,
but this guy also looks like one of them.
Who are you, miss?
I am Nana from the Black Stones!
I just introduced myself to you moments ago!
Oh right.
Did you want something?
I want to use the phone.
Go ahead and use it.
It is free.
Forget it.
I do not want to be overheard.
I will borrow Nobu's phone.
Really, go ahead and use it, miss!
But say I call Ren, what am I going to say to him?
We are not going to be able to see each other for a while anyway.
I actually would prefer that he leave me alone
rather than have him half-heartedly show some affection toward me.
That is what I should say to him.
I am finding it hard to breathe.
It must be because the air is dirty.
That is why I hate Tokyo.
Huh?
The Black Stones?
I know the band!
You do?
Well, it is famous, in a way!
No, not nearly as famous as you.
This is so exciting!
Hey, come on in!
Huh?
But...
Come on!
Hurry!
Ow!
What are you doing, little man?
You seem to be having fun.
Well, I was just saying hi to my neighbor.
Nana?
She is gorgeous!
She sure is a celebrity!
It is the real Nana!
Please give me your autograph!
Huh?
Yuri Kosaka?
That adult video star?
You all seem to know her.
What the hell kind of agency is Shikai Corporation?!
Why are there adult video actresses working for it?!
Well, she did start out as an idol.
But when her popularity dipped, she took her clothes off.
You know a lot about her, Yasu.
And how could you make the dormitory coed?
That is borderline outrageous!
I am guessing it is to accommodate or shelter their talents
with some sorta problem.
Like Ginpei was saying, they just call it a dormitory.
You are right.
But Miss Yuri's been in so many adult movies,
she must have money.
So why is she living in a shabby place like this?
MISS YURI?
MISS YURI?
Miss Yuri?
Miss Yuri?
Nobu!
Switch rooms with me.
Huh?
With a starving wolf like you living next door,
Miss Yuri would be in danger!
I am not going to do anything!
She is a pro!
I do not care!
Just switch!
Why are you always so bossy?
Nobuo.
I could not care less if you get off on porn videos.
But I hope you have not forgotten our plan.
Plan?
To get Hachiko back!
We pledged to fight together!
So do not get involved with other women!
What are you saying?
You are misunderstanding.
Misunderstanding?
You were bashfully and gleefully chatting with Yuri!
No, not that.
I am not necessarily fighting to get Hachi back.
And this is unrelated to that.
For me, Hachi and the band are separate issues.
Besides, why do I have to take care of Hachi
just so you can own her in your yard?
Honestly speaking, I have completely given up on her,
so do whatever you wish on your own.
But...
What?
Damn, you are being stubborn.
Then what are we fighting for?
That is a stupid question.
We are fighting so our music will be accepted as that of a professional.
Hachi has nothing to do with it.
Nana?
Nobu is free to date whoever he wants.
But then, how do I stay connected to Hachi?

and even if I did, Hachi's no longer there.

Lie.
Thanks.
NOBU

Okay!

but you will never die from it.
